title: missing type in composite literal when using address type
body:
by **zzyz666**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Create an array composite literal of type *T eg. []*Elem  
2. Put a literal Elem in the composite literal without type T
3. Error happens, doesn't infer type on literal elements like a []Elem does

What is the expected output?
Compiles correctly, inferring the correct type like []Elem would

What do you see instead?
error.go:#line: missing type in composite literal

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
Linux host 2.6.31-22-generic #70-Ubuntu SMP Wed Dec 1 23:51:13 UTC 2010 i686 GNU/Linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
997e823b0528 tip

Please provide any additional information below.
More detailed explanation in mailing list question.
